name: Wrong Dimension (VSpook, Daycam, mijaande)
description:
You are a test subject of a hidden lab, used to learn more about the other dimension from reality, that only you can access. Use that dimension to your advantage to avoid the obstacles presented in the reality dimension.However that dimension is haunted.

Will you escape the lab with 5 floors?

Controls:

Arrow keys/WASD to move

Space to escape go back to reality for a limited amount of time!

Credits:
Programming: https://www.vspook.itch.io

Art and Animation: https://www.mijaande.itch.io

Music and Sound Effects(couldn't make it into this version due to time constraints): https://www.daycam.itch.io
